item.title: @elonmusk: NED pushed a "coordinated, interjurisdictional" lawfare drive to "demonetize disinformation" by crea...
item.description: NED pushed a "coordinated, interjurisdictional" lawfare drive to "demonetize disinformation" by creating a "common regulatory floor" across the EU & 12 foreign countries to force advertisers & brands to bankrupt you because of your speech.

item.description: A math professor decided to pressure-test Grok 4.20. Grok proposed a sharper formula than the original paper. Optimal, apparently. Pure math just got company!@grok,@elonmusk

item.title: @elonmusk: You don’t have to love@realDonaldTrumpin order to understand that he is saving us from one of the mo...
item.description: You don’t have to love@realDonaldTrumpin order to understand that he is saving us from one of the most deranged, incoherent, unscientific timelines in American history.

item.title: @elonmusk: Grok Voice Mode gives you a variety of voice options: • Ara – Upbeat Female • Eve – Soft, Soothing F...
item.description: Grok Voice Mode gives you a variety of voice options: • Ara – Upbeat Female • Eve – Soft, Soothing Female • Leo – Polished British Male • Rex – Calm, Steady Male • Sal – Smooth, Warm Male • Gork – Relaxed, Laid-back Male Just open the settings icon to pick your voice. You can also adjust the speaking speed to your liking.

item.title: @elonmusk: My friend was hiking uphill in New Zealand with no network coverage and still was able to send his m...
item.description: My friend was hiking uphill in New Zealand with no network coverage and still was able to send his mom a text using SpaceX satellite connectivity. Imagine how many lives this can save. Starlink is saving lives. ❤️
